page.title: 10Our School Meals
page.content: Our school, Churchtown County Primary, is in Sunny Road.It is the biggest Junior School in Southport with 11 classes.There are nine classes in the Infant Department.Including the Nursery, there are 666 children altogether.The dining room has two canteens, Infant and Junior.The Infants have two sittings, followed by the Juniors with packed lunches.The Junior canteen uses the cafeteria system and we have five sittings.To find out what people chose as their main meal one day, I stood in the cafeteria and took notes.I also questioned 13 people about their likes and dislikes. From the list, we can see that nearly everyone had chips. Hot dogs, beefburgers and sausage rolls were the most popular, followed by fish fingers.From the questionaire
